title: How Many Calories in a Hamburger Patty?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a hamburger patty, including full nutrition breakdown, protein, fat details, and easy tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in a Hamburger Patty?
assumptions: Standard 4 oz (113 g) ground beef patty, 80% lean/20% fat, cooked (grilled), no bun, toppings, or seasonings added.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by meat leaness, patty size, cooking method, and added ingredients. Check labels or use a tracker for precision.

quick_answer.text: A standard hamburger patty contains about 290 kcal and 25 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a hamburger patty?
faqs.a: Approximately 290 kcal for a standard 4 oz 80/20 cooked patty.

faqs.q: What's the protein in one hamburger patty?
faqs.a: About 25 g of protein per patty.

faqs.q: Does a leaner patty have fewer calories?
faqs.a: Yes, a 90/10 lean patty drops to around 190 kcal.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in a plain hamburger patty?
faqs.a: No carbs, fiber, or sugars in a basic beef patty.

faqs.q: How does cooking method affect calories in a hamburger patty?
faqs.a: Grilling is lower calorie; frying adds oil and increases by 40+ kcal.
